title: Quotation marks in exercise crash app
body:
Hello, 
I noticed that the app doesn't like it when you use a double quote inside the name of an exercise.
Thanks

Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Create a exercise with a name containing a double quote
2. Try to open the context menu of that exercise

The app immediately crashes.

Android Version: 13
Fast N Fitness Version: 0.20.6
